## What is this?

## Install

To install the latest pdc package directly from GitHub, copy the following line into R:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("pdc","brandmaier")
```


## References

Brandmaier, A. M. (2015). pdc: An R package for complexity-based clustering of time series. Journal of Statistical Software, 67. doi:10.18637/jss.v067.i05
